database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS_Leech Ganglia small metabolites nanoDESI-MS/MS and Standards
entry.description: This data set includes (1) data dependent nanoDESI-MS/MS collection on leech ganglia, (2) targeted nanoDESI-MS/MS on several ions of interests on leech ganglia, (3) nanomate-MS/MS of the commercial standards as the validation for the ion found by nanoDESI.
